definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in

sentences.english: The body is brawny, limbs forceful, head round eyes, short neck little kiss long.
sentences.chinese: 軀體粗壯，四肢強健有力，頭圓頸短，眼小吻長。

sentences.english: Also he should be physically strong and mentally sound.
sentences.chinese: 同時他應該有強健的體魄和良好的精神狀態。

sentences.english: The soldier was as hard as nails.
sentences.chinese: 這位戰士身體如鐵打一般的強健。

sentences.english: And I love to go to gym. Keep muscle, make strong.
sentences.chinese: 我還很喜歡去健身房，做運動強健身體。

sentences.english: The softening effect of pink clay refines the skin's texture while toning the epidermis.
sentences.chinese: 粉紅泥的柔軟作用在強健表皮的同時使肌膚細膩。
性，強健骨盆底部肌肉羣。

sentences.english: I never let my valiant wings off your soft and fairy body.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠不會讓強健的翅膀與你柔軟輕靈的身軀分離。

sentences.english: Black tea contains plenty of tea polyphenols, so it helps to strengthen the bones and can stave osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 紅茶因多酚類含量高，可以強健骨骼，延緩骨質疏鬆。

sentences.english: A strong square jaw is a sign of firm character.
sentences.chinese: 強健的方下巴是剛毅性格的標誌。

sentences.english: With a WHOOSH and the crack of mighty wings, JAKE RETURNS.
sentences.chinese: 伴隨着呼呼聲和強健巨翼拍打的噼啪聲，傑克回來了。

sentences.english: A strong password contains a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters, along with at least one symbol.
sentences.chinese: 一個強健的密碼包含大小寫字母以及至少一個符號。

sentences.english: He even pulled up his shirt to show me his toned and tanned abs on his new washboard stomach.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至撩起襯衫給我看他那健美膚色強健的腹肌。

sentences.english: "It requires a robust cell, " Hackett says.
sentences.chinese: “這需要一個強健的細胞”，哈科特說。

sentences.english: On his strong shoulders, mottled and spotted, shed the shadow of lunar light.
sentences.chinese: 斑駁月影，疏落地，撒滿他寬闊強健的肩膀。

sentences.english: Please air coolingcept my sincere wishes for the New Year. I hope youwillcontinue to enjoy good healternativeh.
sentences.chinese: 請接受我誠摯的新年祝福，順祝身體強健。

sentences.english: She ost 90, but still very robust.
sentences.chinese: 她將近90歲了，但身體仍然十分強健。

definition: the body/organism (usually human)/(fig.) fabric (of society etc)/cohesive structure (of an entity)
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
to toughen/to temper/to engage in physical exercise/to work out/(fig.) to develop one's skills/to train oneself
